item.description:
Unwind at the end of your week with a relaxing evening on the water and dinner afterward.

We'll paddle the tidal back bays and creeks of Portsmouth, maybe heading up Spruce Creek and under the 'singing bridge' where kids often jump off into the water.  This will be a leisurely paddle with dinner afterward in mind.  We may or may not see: herons, cormorants, eagles, and seals, oh my!

 

The weather promises to be cool with clear skies.

Sailboats, bridges, buoys, gulls, calm water, your kayak...and you.

Bring dry clothes to change into!

Rental Kayak Available!  Ask Larry for Details.

**Please let me know if you can come a little earlier.  I timed this at 5:30 to accommodate work schedules but we could begin earlier.**

 

LIABILITY RELEASE

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.

As organizer I make no claims regarding any expertise for this outing. Fee is for meetup site expenses and planning .  This is not a guided tour. - Larry Pilla
item.name: Portsmouth Sunset Paddle
